caption.p: Structural alignment of the RBD-ACE2 interface from SARS-CoV-2 and SARS-CoV. The SARS-CoV-2 RBD-ACE complex (PDB 6VW1) with ACE2 in blue and RBD in purple/orange are superimposed to the SARS-CoV RBD-ACE complex (PDB 2AJF) with ACE2 in cyan and RBD in green. N-Terminal, central, and C-terminal clusters are highlighted in black boxes with 1, 2, and 3, respectively.
